name: Debris (itch) (Indievation  Games)
description:
Welcome to Debris, the next generation of space arcade games.

Fly your ship precariously through the intense asteroid-infested waters of space. Go through narrow gaps through the 3D environment with stunning graphics, immersing you in the world.

Asteroids are spread out in the asteroid belt in a circular path, with programmatically randomized scales, shapes, rotations and positions to give you a unique game every time.

Featuring a simple points system, with storage for your high score to compare with friends, or keep track of your progress.

Controls:

The spaceship can be controlled horizontally with the A and D keys, and vertically with the W and S keys. It will move forwards automatically.
